namespace hiro::draw¶

Overview¶

Extensions for object visualization. Implements a higher level of OpenGL rendering. More…

namespace draw {

// typedefs

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::Style> PStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::Renderer> PRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BillboardStyle> PBillboardStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<BillboardRenderer> PBillboardRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<CircleStyle> PCircleStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<CircleRenderer> PCircleRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::FrustumStyle> PFrustumStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::FrustumRenderer> PFrustumRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::GeometryStyle> PGeometryStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::GeometryRenderer> PGeometryRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::GraphStyle> PGraphStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::GraphRenderer> PGraphRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<ImageStyle> PImageStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<ImageRenderer> PImageRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::LineFieldStyle> PLineFieldStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::LineFieldRenderer> PLineFieldRenderer;
typedef hiro::draw::GeometryStyle MeshStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::MeshStyle> PMeshStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::MeshRenderer> PMeshRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::PointCloudStyle> PPointCloudStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::PointCloudRenderer> PPointCloudRenderer;
typedef ImageStyle RasterStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::RasterStyle> PRasterStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::RasterRenderer> PRasterRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::SkeletonStyle> PSkeletonStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::SkeletonRenderer> PSkeletonRenderer;
typedef hiro::draw::MeshStyle SkinnedMeshStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::SkinnedMeshStyle> PSkinnedMeshStyle;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::SkinnedMeshRenderer> PSkinnedMeshRenderer;
typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::Scene> PScene;

// enums

enum AntiAliasing;
enum CameraMode;
enum ColorSource;
enum GeometryName;
enum GroundGrid;
enum PrimitiveName;
enum TextAlignment;

// structs

struct BillboardStyle;
struct FacesStyle;
struct FrustumStyle;
struct Geometry;
struct GeometryStyle;
struct GraphStyle;
struct ImageStyle;
struct LineFieldStyle;
struct NormalsStyle;
struct PointCloudStyle;
struct PointsStyle;
struct ProjectionParams;
struct SkeletonStyle;
struct Style;

// classes

class BillboardRenderer;
class CircleRenderer;
class CircleStyle;
class ElementRenderer;
class FrustumRenderer;
class GeometryRenderer;
class GraphRenderer;
class ImageRenderer;
class LineFieldRenderer;
class MeshRenderer;
class PointCloudRenderer;
class PrimitiveDatabase;
class RasterRenderer;
class RenderSystem;
class Renderer;
class Scene;
class SkeletonRenderer;
class SkinnedMeshRenderer;
class TextPrinter;
class TextRenderer;
class VisualCamera;
class VisualCameraController;

// global variables

const uint8_t DEFAULT_AXIS_OVERLAY_LAYER = 128;
const uint8_t DEFAULT_GROUND_OVERLAY_LAYER = 0;

// global functions

HIRO_DRAW_API std::string ToString(hiro::draw::GeometryName geom);
HIRO_DRAW_API std::string ToString(hiro::draw::PrimitiveName prim);

} // namespace draw

Detailed Documentation¶

Extensions for object visualization. Implements a higher level of OpenGL rendering.

Typedefs¶

typedef std::shared_ptr<BillboardStyle> PBillboardStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type BillboardStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<BillboardRenderer> PBillboardRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type BillboardRenderer.

typedef std::shared_ptr<CircleStyle> PCircleStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type CircleStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<CircleRenderer> PCircleRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type CircleRenderer.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::FrustumStyle> PFrustumStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type FrustumStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::FrustumRenderer> PFrustumRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type FrustumRenderer.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::GeometryStyle> PGeometryStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type GeometryStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::GeometryRenderer> PGeometryRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type GeometryRenderer.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::GraphStyle> PGraphStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type GraphStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::GraphRenderer> PGraphRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type GraphRenderer.

typedef std::shared_ptr<ImageStyle> PImageStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type ImageStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<ImageRenderer> PImageRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type ImageRenderer.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::LineFieldStyle> PLineFieldStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type LineFieldStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::LineFieldRenderer> PLineFieldRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type LineFieldRenderer.

typedef hiro::draw::GeometryStyle MeshStyle

Stylization of the rendered mesh.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::MeshStyle> PMeshStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type MeshStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::MeshRenderer> PMeshRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type MeshRenderer.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::PointCloudStyle> PPointCloudStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type PointCloudStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::PointCloudRenderer> PPointCloudRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type PointCloudRenderer.

typedef ImageStyle RasterStyle

Structure specifying how the raster should be rendered.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::RasterStyle> PRasterStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type RasterStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::RasterRenderer> PRasterRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type RasterRenderer.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::SkeletonStyle> PSkeletonStyle

Shared pointer to an object of the type SkeletonStyle.

typedef std::shared_ptr<hiro::draw::SkeletonRenderer> PSkeletonRenderer

Shared pointer to an object of the type SkeletonRenderer.

Global Functions¶

HIRO_DRAW_API std::string ToString(hiro::draw::GeometryName geom)

Converts hiro::draw::GeometryName type to the text reprersentation.

HIRO_DRAW_API std::string ToString(hiro::draw::PrimitiveName prim)

Converts hiro::draw::PrimitiveName type to text reprersentation.
